exercises.name: Squat
exercises.description: Bend your knees and push your hips back, keeping your chest up.

exercises.name: Push-Up
exercises.description: Lie face down, lift your body with your hands, keeping the body straight.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Hold a straight body position in a push-up stance, supported by your forearms.

exercises.name: Lunge
exercises.description: Step forward and bend your knee until it forms a 90-degree angle.

exercises.name: Lateral Raise
exercises.description: Lift your arms sideways to shoulder height.

exercises.name: Crunch
exercises.description: Lie on your back, lift your torso toward your knees.

exercises.name: Burpee
exercises.description: From a squat position, jump, fall into a push-up, and return to starting position.

exercises.name: Running in Place
exercises.description: Run in place, lifting your knees toward your chest.

exercises.name: Bicep Curl
exercises.description: Bend your arms, bringing weights toward your shoulders.

exercises.name: Bridge
exercises.description: Lie on your back, lift your hips toward the ceiling.

exercises.name: Jumping Jack
exercises.description: Jump and spread your legs and arms simultaneously.

exercises.name: Bent-Over Row
exercises.description: Lean slightly forward and pull weights toward your chest.

exercises.name: Mountain Climber
exercises.description: In a plank position, alternate bringing your knees toward your chest.

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.description: Lift a weight from the ground with a straight back and slightly bent knees.

exercises.name: Pull-Up
exercises.description: Pull a bar or weight toward your chest.

exercises.name: Step-Up
exercises.description: Step onto a box or step, alternating legs.

exercises.name: Jump Rope
exercises.description: Jump over a moving rope continuously.

exercises.name: Calf Raise
exercises.description: Stand on your toes and slowly lower back down.

exercises.name: Superman
exercises.description: Lie face down, lift your arms and legs simultaneously.

exercises.name: Front Raise
exercises.description: Lift your arms in front of you to shoulder height.
